FuncDef: This command enables the context to display the Ethernet-Segment parameters.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of an Ethernet segment for which to show information; maximum28 characters are allowed.
Displays all available information for the specified Ethernet segment.
Displays information for the specified EVI. Values-1 to 65535.
Displays information for the specified ISID. Values-1 to 16777215.
Displays the vc-id, qtag, s-tag, or c-tag per s-tag virtual ranges configured on the virtual Ethernet segment.
